title: Create Pod with Tolerations
description: Create a Pod named ||toleration-pod|| using image ||nginx:1.20-alpine|| that tolerates taint ||key=value|| with ||NoSchedule|| effect in the ||uranus|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get pod toleration-pod -n uranus -o jsonpath='{.spec.tolerations[0].key}'
validations.description: Pod should have toleration for key=value
